title: First Impressions
description:
Kathryn Wood, Michele Carlo, and Marc Abbott tell stories about blindfolded sex with strangers, a 70's high school's "Kill Whitey Day," and the son of a cop learning about race in America.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (JJ Evans, Michele Carlo, Kevin Allison, Robert Plant, Kendrick Lamar, Jimmy Page, Jeff Barr, Marc Abbott, Kathryn Wood, The Electric Peanut Butter Company, Beyoncé)
